title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document all requirements for the CellularRegenerationStimulator, including functional, non-functional, and regulatory requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware components, software modules, communication interfaces, data flow, and security considerations. This task also includes defining the system's interaction with the device's operating system, power management, user interface design, and providing a clear overview of the system's software and hardware architecture, highlighting any potential challenges or trade-offs, and proposing solutions to address them.

title: Develop Electromagnetic Field Generation Module
description: Implement the module responsible for generating and controlling the electromagnetic fields used for cellular stimulation.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for controlling and monitoring the device.

title: Implement Data Storage and Analysis
description: Develop the database and data analysis components for storing and analyzing treatment data.

title: Ensure Regulatory Compliance
description: Conduct necessary tests and obtain certifications to ensure compliance with relevant regulations for medical devices.

title: Implement Comprehensive Security Measures for Patient Data Protection (Revised)
description: Update the task description to reflect changes and improvements. Design, develop, and implement robust security measures for safeguarding patient data, preventing unauthorized access, maintaining data integrity, and ensuring secure remote access. This includes: encryption (AES-256 for sensitive data), secure multi-factor authentication (including biometric options), intrusion detection and prevention systems, regular system audits, VPN implementation for remote access, a role-based access control system to manage user permissions, and HIPAA compliance. Additionally, consider conducting regular security training for staff.

title: Create Deployment and Maintenance Plan
description: Develop a plan for deploying the device to healthcare facilities and providing ongoing maintenance and support.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create comprehensive user documentation, including installation guides, operation manuals, and troubleshooting instructions.
